sqlMap.select: select pch.program_course_key as programCourseKey, pm.program_name as programName, stt.component_description as branchName, stt1.component_description as specializationName, stt2.component_description as semesterName, pch.semester_code as semesterCode, (case when pch.semester_status='ACT' then 'Active' else 'Inactive' end) as semesterStatus from program_course_header pch,program_master pm,system_table_two stt,system_table_two stt1, system_table_two stt2, program_offered_by pob where pm.program_id=pch.program_id and (pch.branch_id=stt.component_code and stt.group_code='BRNCOD' and stt.university_code=#universityId#) and (pch.specialization_id=stt1.component_code and stt1.group_code='SPCLCD' and stt1.university_code=#universityId#) and (pch.semester_code=stt2.component_code and stt2.university_code=#universityId# and stt2.group_code='SEMCOD') and pob.offered_by=#entityId# and pob.program_id=pch.program_id and pob.branch_id=pch.branch_id and pob.specialization_id=pch.specialization_id order by pch.program_course_key;
select component_code as processCode, component_description as processName from system_table_two where university_code=#universityId# and group_code='PRCMST' and active='1'

select stt.component_code as activityCode, stt.component_description as activityName from system_table_two stt where stt.university_code=#universityId# and stt.group_code='ACTMST' and stt.active='1' AND stt.component_code NOT IN(select activity from activity_master where process=#processCode# and entity_id=#entityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# and session_end_date=#sessionEndDate#)
select start_date as sessionStartDate, end_date as sessionEndDate from university_master where university_code=#universityId# and current_status=1

select semester_start_date as semesterStartDate, semester_end_date as semesterEndDate from program_registration where university_id=#universityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and status='ACT' and session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# and session_end_date=#sessionEndDate#

select semester_start_date as semesterStartDate, semester_end_date as semesterEndDate, process as processCode, activity as activityCode, activity_sequence as activitySequence, am.program_course_key as programCourseKey, (case when am.status='ACT' then 'Active' else 'Inactive' end) as status, stt3.component_description as processName, stt4.component_description as activityName, pm.program_name as programName, stt.component_code branchCode, stt.component_description branchName, stt1.component_description specializationName, stt2.component_description semesterName, stt2.component_code semesterCode from activity_master am, program_master pm, system_table_two stt, system_table_two stt1, system_table_two stt2, system_table_two stt3, system_table_two stt4, program_course_header pch where am.program_course_key=pch.program_course_key and am.entity_id=#entityId# and am.session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# and am.session_end_date=#sessionEndDate# and stt.component_code=pch.branch_id and stt.group_code='BRNCOD' and stt.university_code=#universityId# and stt1.component_code=pch.specialization_id and stt1.group_code='SPCLCD' and stt1.university_code=#universityId# and stt2.component_code=pch.semester_code and stt2.group_code='SEMCOD' and stt2.university_code=#universityId# and stt3.component_code=am.process and stt3.group_code='PRCMST' and stt3.university_code=#universityId# and stt4.component_code=am.activity and stt4.group_code='ACTMST' and stt4.university_code=#universityId# and pm.program_id=pch.program_id order by activity_sequence;

sqlMap.delete: delete from activity_master where entity_id=#entityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and process=#processCode# and activity=#activityCode# and semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate# and session_start_date=#sessionStartDate# and session_end_date=#sessionEndDate#
